translation: Tihindis (mqds) buths pytth āyhi nagvạry th (nvur borut) rve phiruk akith kun.
Aamhi vjh kinụ̄ zi timn nishhi āv aakh nabyna (yymụ̄ tihnzkth cztt).
Th tohyhi kya khbr chhav bnan chuh suh ma spdihe (tuhndi tvjh sintụ̄ mzyd) pak.
Nath ma krihe (tuhnz) nṣyḥt qbvl pth diyhi he nṣyḥt ts (mzyd) fạydh.
Albth yus shkhṣ (dyn nishhi) be prvah chuh.
Tohụ̄ chihv tmụ̄ sndi (aslam qbvl krnh) khạṭr zyadh ahtmam kran.
Yylhi kh zn tohyhi pytth chhanh kanhh dhmh dạry (yʿny dhmh dạry hund bar) agr suh pạkyzgy (ayman) qbvl kri tinh.
Th suh yus tohyhi nishhi (panh rczr czhanddnch) kvshsh kran āv.
Byyhi chuh suh (pnnis rbs) khvczan thi.
mgr tohụ̄ chhv nh ts kun tvjh frmavan.
(ae ʿẓmt valhi ttatthhi!) yithhi knụ̄ nh, be shk chih yim (qrāny āyat) nṣyḥt.
Yus shkhṣ yczhh aath krin qbvl (th ḥifẓ).
(yim) chih ʿzt valyn th aḥtram valyn varqn mnz (lykhith).
Yim sytthah blnd mrtbh (th) pak chih.
Tithyn sfyrn (th kạtibn) hndi dsụ̄chih (brvnhh kun vatimtụ̄).
Yim sytthah kramt vạlụ̄ (th) aṭaʿtkụ̄ pykr chih.
Hlak gczihn (suh bdbkht ankar krn vvl) ansan kiyuth nashkrgzar chuh (yus yiczah ʿẓym nʿmt lbth thi tamich qdr chuhnh kran).
Allah tʿālyā hn kamhi chyz nishhi chuh yhi pạd kormut.
Nṭfh nishhi korun yhi pạd,pth korun sinty amụ̄ sund (ṣnf th jns kh lḥaẓh) tʿīn.
Pth krn amụ̄ sndi khạṭr (tshkyl,artqaʿ th tkmyl pth majhi hndi shkmh mnz nyrnch) vath āsan.
Pth diyutun amis mvt,pth korun yhi qbri mnz (dfn).
Pth yylhi suh yczhh ams kri (navi sr zndh krith) khrra.
Pzụ̄pạtthụ̄ kor nh amụ̄ (nafrman ansann) suh (ḥq) pvur yymiyuk amis (Allah tʿālyā hn) ḥkm avs diyutmut.
Lhādha pazi ansans zi pnnis ghdhahs kun vuchihn (pth krin ghvr).
Be shk vvl aashi sytthah zvr san āb.
Pth kor aashi zmyns tr dith phas.
Pth vopdvv aashi aath mnz anaj.
Byyhi dachh th sbzy.
Byyhi zytvn th khzr.
Byyhi gnụ̄ gnụ̄ bagh.
Byyhi (rngh rngh) phl myvh th (janvrn hund) ghdha.
Khod tuhndi khạṭr th tuhndyn charvayn khạṭr (zndh rvznuk) saman.
Pth yylhi knn (hndụ̄ prdh) phattvan vajinụ̄ āvaz yiyhi.
Tamhi doh czalhi ansan pnnis bạyis nishhi.
Byyhi pnnhi majhi th pnnis mạlis nishhi (thi).
Byyhi pnnhi khandarinhi th pnnis aavlads nishhi (thi).
Tamhi doh āshi pth shkhṣs ticzh (pryshan krn vajinụ̄) ḥalt laḥq gmcz yosh ts (pth kạnsh nishhi) be prvah kri.
Tamy doh āsn varyah buthụ̄ (tithụ̄ thi yim nvur sintụ̄) pzlan (āsn).
(tim) āsn aasan gindan (th) khvshyhi mnavan.
Th varyah buthụ̄ āsn tithụ̄ yimn pytth tamhi doh grd āshi pymcz.
(mzyd) āshi timn (buthyn) pytth kryhnyar khsith.
Yimae lukh āsn kạfr (th) fạjr (bdkrdar).
